= How to build macsim =

Currently, MacSim support two ways of build process.

 # autotool
 # scons

Note that we will keep automake process for the macsim-sst build. Otherwise, we will maintain scons build.


== Requirement ==

 # scons
  * ubuntu
{{{
apt-get install scons
}}}
 # autotools
{{{
apt-get install automake autoconf libtool
}}}


== Build Steps ==

=== scons ===

{{{
./build.py
}}}

 * build options
   * -j (--thread) : specify number of threads for parallel build
   * -d : debug build (-g)
   * -p : gprof build (-pg)
   * -c : clean
   * --dramsim : using DRAMSim2

=== autotool ===
Please refer to macsim-top/trunk/README

{{{
libtoolize
aclocal
automake --add-missing
autoconf
./configure
make
}}}

OR
{{{
libtoolize && aclocal && automake --add-missing && autoconf && ./configure
make
}}}

OR 
{{{
./autogen.sh
make
}}}
